name: oval-stone
effect: Held by happiny : Holder evolves into chansey when it levels up during the daytime.
short_effect: Level-up during Day on a Happiny: Holder evolves into Chansey.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is shaped like an egg.
flavor_text.platinum: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is shaped like an egg.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is shaped like an egg.
